Description: Compare multiple runs of long read sequencing data and alignments
EDAM_operations: Box-Whisker plot plotting, Visualisation, Multiple sample visualisation
EDAM_reduced_operations: Box-Whisker plot plotting, Multiple sample visualisation
bio.tool_description: Compare multiple runs of long read sequencing data and alignments. Creates violin plots or box plots of length, quality and percent identity and creates dynamic, overlaying read length histograms and a cumulative yield plot.
